name: Air Canada Rouge A319 Exit Row Review - Montreal to Calgary
description:
In April, I flew with Air Canada Rouge on their Airbus A319, on a fairly long domestic flight from Montreal to Calgary. How did my long legs do on this somewhat notorious aircraft? Find out in this trip report :)

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

SOCIAL MEDIA
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/ap.aviationphotography

FLIGHT INFORMATION
Airline: Air Canada Rouge (ROU/RV)
Aircraft: Airbus A319-114 (A319)
Flight Number: AC1587
Seat: 19E/F (Economy Class)
Livery: Standard
Engines: 2x CFMI CFM56-5A5 
Registration: C-FYIY
Route: Montreal-Trudeau (YUL) - Calgary (YYC)
Callsign: ROUGE 1587
Runway used: 24L (YUL) - 35R (YYC)
Date filmed: April 2019
